description: Our date and orange fruit loaf recipe is delicious served slightly warm with butter or ricotta cheese and a drizzle of honey. The perfect afternoon tea treat.
keywords: Fruit bread,Orange,Seafood free,Soy free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Date & Orange Fruit Loaf Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Soak the dates in orange juice for 30 minutes, drain and reserve the juice.

Mix the flour, sugar, salt, yeast, cinnamon, orange zest and dates in a large bowl. Make a well in the centre and pour in the warm milk, butter and orange juice. Mix with a wooden spoon and then use your hands to form a dough.
Knead in the bowl until the dough is smooth and springy. Transfer to a clean bowl and cover with a damp tea towel. Leave to rise in a warm place for 1 hour, until doubled in size.

Knock the dough back gently and lightly knead for 1 minute. Dust 2 loaf tins with flour. Halve the dough and shape into 2 ovals. Place in the loaf tins, cover with a damp tea towel and leave to rise for 20 minutes.
Pre-heat the oven to 160°C and bake the loaves for 20-25 minutes, until golden. Leave to cool in the tin before slicing.
